00028 enum BroadphaseNativeTypes
00029 {
00030         // polyhedral convex shapes
00031         BOX_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00032         TRIANGLE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,

00034         CONVEX_TRIANGLEMESH_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,

00036         CONVEX_POINT_CLOUD_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00037         CUSTOM_POLYHEDRAL_SHAPE_TYPE,
00038 //implicit convex shapes
00039 IMPLICIT_CONVEX_SHAPES_START_HERE,
00040         SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00041         MULTI_SPHERE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00042         CAPSULE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00043         CONE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00044         CONVEX_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00045         CYLINDER_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00046         UNIFORM_SCALING_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,

00048         MINKOWSKI_DIFFERENCE_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00049         BOX_2D_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00050         CONVEX_2D_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00051         CUSTOM_CONVEX_SHAPE_TYPE,
00052 //concave shapes
00053 CONCAVE_SHAPES_START_HERE,
00054         //keep all the convex shapetype below here, for the check IsConvexShape in broadphase proxy!
00055         TRIANGLE_MESH_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00056         SCALED_TRIANGLE_MESH_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00058         FAST_CONCAVE_MESH_PROXYTYPE,
00059         //terrain
00060         TERRAIN_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00062         GIMPACT_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00064     MULTIMATERIAL_TRIANGLE_MESH_PROXYTYPE,
00065         
00066         EMPTY_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE,
00067         STATIC_PLANE_PROXYTYPE,
00068         CUSTOM_CONCAVE_SHAPE_TYPE,
00069 CONCAVE_SHAPES_END_HERE,
00070

00085 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(struct) btBroadphaseProxy
00086 {
00087 
00088 BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00089         
00091         enum CollisionFilterGroups
00092         {
00093                 DefaultFilter = 1,
00094                 StaticFilter = 2,
00095                 KinematicFilter = 4,
00096                 DebrisFilter = 8,
00097                         SensorTrigger = 16,
00098                         CharacterFilter = 32,
00099                 AllFilter = -1 //all bits sets: DefaultFilter | StaticFilter | KinematicFilter | DebrisFilter | SensorTrigger
00100         };
00101 
00102         //Usually the client btCollisionObject or Rigidbody class
00103         void*   m_clientObject;
00104         int             m_collisionFilterGroup;
00105         int             m_collisionFilterMask;
00106 
00107         int             m_uniqueId;//m_uniqueId is introduced for paircache. could get rid of this, by calculating the address offset etc.
00108 
00109         btVector3       m_aabbMin;
00110         btVector3       m_aabbMax;
00111 
00112         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE int getUid() const
00113         {
00114                 return m_uniqueId;
00115         }
00116 
00117         //used for memory pools
00118         btBroadphaseProxy() :m_clientObject(0)
00119         {
00120         }
00121 
00122         btBroadphaseProxy(const btVector3& aabbMin,const btVector3& aabbMax,void* userPtr, int collisionFilterGroup,  int collisionFilterMask)
00123                 :m_clientObject(userPtr),
00124                 m_collisionFilterGroup(collisionFilterGroup),
00125                 m_collisionFilterMask(collisionFilterMask),
00126                 m_aabbMin(aabbMin),
00127                 m_aabbMax(aabbMax)
00128         {
00129         }
00130 
00131         
00132 
00133         static SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool isPolyhedral(int proxyType)
00134         {
00135                 return (proxyType  < IMPLICIT_CONVEX_SHAPES_START_HERE);
00136         }
00137 
00138         static SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool   isConvex(int proxyType)
00139         {
00140                 return (proxyType < CONCAVE_SHAPES_START_HERE);
00141         }
00142 
00143         static SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool   isNonMoving(int proxyType)
00144         {
00145                 return (isConcave(proxyType) && !(proxyType==GIMPACT_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE));
00146         }
00147 
00148         static SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool   isConcave(int proxyType)
00149         {
00150                 return ((proxyType > CONCAVE_SHAPES_START_HERE) &&
00151                         (proxyType < CONCAVE_SHAPES_END_HERE));
00152         }
00153         static SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool   isCompound(int proxyType)
00154         {
00155                 return (proxyType == COMPOUND_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE);
00156         }
00157 
00158         static SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool   isSoftBody(int proxyType)
00159         {
00160                 return (proxyType == SOFTBODY_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE);
00161         }
00162 
00163         static SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool isInfinite(int proxyType)
00164         {
00165                 return (proxyType == STATIC_PLANE_PROXYTYPE);
00166         }
00167 
00168         static SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool isConvex2d(int proxyType)
00169         {
00170                 return (proxyType == BOX_2D_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE) || (proxyType == CONVEX_2D_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE);
00171         }
00172 
00173         
00174 }
00175 ;

00177 class btCollisionAlgorithm;
00178 
00179 struct btBroadphaseProxy;

00182 
00185 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(struct) btBroadphasePair
00186 {
00187         btBroadphasePair ()
00188                 :
00189         m_pProxy0(0),
00190                 m_pProxy1(0),
00191                 m_algorithm(0),
00192                 m_internalInfo1(0)
00193         {
00194         }
00195 
00196 BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00197 
00198         btBroadphasePair(const btBroadphasePair& other)
00199                 :               m_pProxy0(other.m_pProxy0),
00200                                 m_pProxy1(other.m_pProxy1),
00201                                 m_algorithm(other.m_algorithm),
00202                                 m_internalInfo1(other.m_internalInfo1)
00203         {
00204         }
00205         btBroadphasePair(btBroadphaseProxy& proxy0,btBroadphaseProxy& proxy1)
00206         {
00207 
00208                 //keep them sorted, so the std::set operations work
00209                 if (proxy0.m_uniqueId < proxy1.m_uniqueId)
00210         { 
00211             m_pProxy0 = &proxy0; 
00212             m_pProxy1 = &proxy1; 
00213         }
00214         else 
00215         { 
00216                         m_pProxy0 = &proxy1; 
00217             m_pProxy1 = &proxy0; 
00218         }
00219 
00220                 m_algorithm = 0;
00221                 m_internalInfo1 = 0;
00222 
00223         }
00224         
00225         btBroadphaseProxy* m_pProxy0;
00226         btBroadphaseProxy* m_pProxy1;
00227         
00228         mutable btCollisionAlgorithm* m_algorithm;
00229         union { void* m_internalInfo1; int m_internalTmpValue;};//don't use this data, it will be removed in future version.
00230 
00231 };
00232 
00233 /*
00234 //comparison for set operation, see Solid DT_Encounter
00235 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool operator<(const btBroadphasePair& a, const btBroadphasePair& b) 
00236 { 
00237     return a.m_pProxy0 < b.m_pProxy0 || 
00238         (a.m_pProxy0 == b.m_pProxy0 && a.m_pProxy1 < b.m_pProxy1); 
00239 }
00240 */
00241 
00242 
00243 
00244 class btBroadphasePairSortPredicate
00245 {
00246         public:
00247 
00248                 bool operator() ( const btBroadphasePair& a, const btBroadphasePair& b ) const
00249                 {
00250                         const int uidA0 = a.m_pProxy0 ? a.m_pProxy0->m_uniqueId : -1;
00251                         const int uidB0 = b.m_pProxy0 ? b.m_pProxy0->m_uniqueId : -1;
00252                         const int uidA1 = a.m_pProxy1 ? a.m_pProxy1->m_uniqueId : -1;
00253                         const int uidB1 = b.m_pProxy1 ? b.m_pProxy1->m_uniqueId : -1;
00254 
00255                          return uidA0 > uidB0 || 
00256                                 (a.m_pProxy0 == b.m_pProxy0 && uidA1 > uidB1) ||
00257                                 (a.m_pProxy0 == b.m_pProxy0 && a.m_pProxy1 == b.m_pProxy1 && a.m_algorithm > b.m_algorithm); 
00258                 }
00259 };
00260 
00261 
00262 SIMD_FORCE_INLINE bool operator==(const btBroadphasePair& a, const btBroadphasePair& b) 
00263 {
00264          return (a.m_pProxy0 == b.m_pProxy0) && (a.m_pProxy1 == b.m_pProxy1);
00265 }
